component.name: runik
component.summary: Generate and manage custom e-reader dictionaries

description.p: Runik leverages the crowd-sourced info of fan wikis to generate custom e-reader dictionaries, extending the vocabulary of your e-reader to include fictional references specific to the world of your book.
Stay immersed in your book with in-text definitions for items, characters, and locations unique to that wolrd. No wifi, no jailbreaking, no need to put down your device.
